{"id":924263408,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1680100372,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/924263408/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Minimum Number of Fibonacci Numbers Whose Sum Is K","memory":"39.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findMinFibonacciNumbers(int k) {\n        List<Integer>l=new ArrayList<>();\n        int a=1,b=1,c=2;\n        l.add(a);l.add(b);l.add(c);\n        while(c<=k)\n        {\n            a=b;\n            b=c;\n            c=a+b;\n            l.add(c);\n        }\n        //k-=l.get(l.size()-2);\n        int n=0;\n        while(k!=0)\n        {\n            if(l.contains(k)==true)\n            {\n                k=0;\n                n+=1;\n            }\n            else\n            {\n                int d=0;\n                for(int i=0;i<l.size();i++)\n                {\n                    if(l.get(i)>k)\n                    {\n                        d=i-1;\n                        break;\n                    }\n                }\n                k-=l.get(d);\n                n+=1;\n            }\n        }\n        return n;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-minimum-number-of-fibonacci-numbers-whose-sum-is-k","has_notes":false}
